definition: treasure bowl (mythology)/fig. source of wealth/cornucopia/gold mine
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
jewel/gem/treasure/precious
variant of 寶|宝[bao3]
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The new product became a goldmine for the company.
sentences.chinese: 该项新产品成了该公司的聚宝盆。

sentences.english: Building a reservoir is the cornucopia that builds a fortune actually.
sentences.chinese: 建立一座水库其实就是建立一个财富的聚宝盆。

sentences.english: To get a real cornucopia of life's wealth.
sentences.chinese: 要想在生活聚宝盆中获取真正的财富。

sentences.english: Diligence is a money-spinner, thrifty is the cornucopia.
sentences.chinese: 勤是摇钱树，俭是聚宝盆。

definition: ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
lit. gold and jade fill the hall (idiom)/fig. abundant wealth/abundance of knowledge
a legendary tree that sheds coins when shaken/a source of easy money (idiom)
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
god of wealth
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
magic gourd, granting your every wish
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
god of wealth/very wealthy man
financial resources/source of revenue
mythical animal that brings luck and wards off evil, having head of a dragon and lion's body, often with hoofs, wings and tail/also written 辟邪/fig. valiant soldier
affluent/very rich
Yuanbao district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
a silver or gold ingot/mock ingot (burnt as offering in worship)/a name for ancient currency/a rare genius
calabash or bottle gourd (Lagenaria siceraria)/hoist/generic term for block and tackle (or parts thereof)/muddled/(poker) full house
variant of 紅運|红运[hong2 yun4]
